unnormalised: DU cutoffs are so high, even Einstein would sweat! News reaching us says that the 1st cutoff list for Delhi University admissions saw some courses reaching a whopping 99.75%. Guess our to-be netas and babus are already prepping for those "minimum government, maximum governance" cutoffs in their future careers too, eh?
normalised: D-U cutoffs are so high, even Einstein would sweat! News reaching us says that the first cutoff list for Delhi University admissions saw some courses reaching a whopping ninety nine point seven five percent. Guess our to-be netas and babus are already prepping for those "minimum government, maximum governance" cutoffs in their future careers too, eh?

unnormalised: Students, armed with their 90+% scorecards, are reportedly lining up outside colleges like it’s the opening day for the new Salman Khan flick. Sources say some are even bringing cheerleaders and dhol-walas, just in case their percentage is *almost* enough. Talk about pressure cooker situations! Imagine telling your relatives you got 98% and they ask, "So, which college did you *not* get into?"
normalised: Students, armed with their ninety plus percent scorecards, are reportedly lining up outside colleges like it's the opening day for the new Salman Khan flick. Sources say some are even bringing cheerleaders and dhol-walas, just in case their percentage is *almost* enough. Talk about pressure cooker situations! Imagine telling your relatives you got ninety eight percent and they ask, "So, which college did you *not* get into?"

unnormalised: Meanwhile, coaching centers are probably doing a happy dance, projecting even higher cutoffs next year. Investment opportunity alert: start a company that rents out shoulders for parents to cry on after seeing the cutoff lists. I'm calling it "TearSupport Pvt. Ltd."—patent pending, btw.
normalised: Meanwhile, coaching centers are probably doing a happy dance, projecting even higher cutoffs next year. Investment opportunity alert: start a company that rents out shoulders for parents to cry on after seeing the cutoff lists. I'm calling it "TearSupport Private Limited"—patent pending, by the way.

unnormalised: On a serious note (for a whole 30 seconds), all the best to everyone applying! Whether you get into your dream course or not, remember marks aren't everything. Unless you're applying to DU, then maybe they kinda are. Just kidding! (mostly).
normalised: On a serious note (for a whole thirty seconds), all the best to everyone applying! Whether you get into your dream course or not, remember marks aren't everything. Unless you're applying to D-U, then maybe they kind of are. Just kidding! (mostly).
